attributes.additional_details: 0% or 5%vat untill the million homes are fixed and people live healthier and vat paying companies can become more competitive instead of chemical treatment companies having a advantage on prices in many cases leaving the real proffesionals who don't treat or cover up eradicate damp
attributes.background: Consider damp not a luxury good.im ashamed being a vat charging company taxing in some cases the most needy then passing the proceeds 20% to the government .now we can fix damp for good and stop condensation with the latest methods we use so now there is no need to use chemicals or barriers anymore

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's not clear what specific services you want VAT to be lowered for.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you did want to start a new petition you'd need to provide your full name.
